sentence.Network_en: That the BJP was involved in the demolition of the Babri Masjid was never in doubt.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们一直都确信反对党BJP参与了BabriMasjid破坏事件.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 清真寺（masjid）(Masjid)伊斯兰教建筑群体的型制之一。是穆斯林举行礼拜、穆斯林举行宗教功课、举办宗教教育和宣教等活动的中心场所。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Arabic, 'place of worship or prostration in prayer', probably ultimately of Aramaic origin
